name: Sliding Puppies
description:
Help the puppies patrol with snowboard and slide through a slippery, zig-zag, snowy path and chase on a beautiful paw forest to collect presents for all the children this Christmas! It's a sleding puppy patrol game, but it's not only for Xmas: there're dozens of paw characters other than Santa puppy ready to be unlocked, in which some special rider even comes with completely different worlds for you to dog patrol!

- Unlock achievements and chase down enemies
- Unlock santa claus, dog, reindeers and other paw police
- Unlock new characters and patrol along the way!
- Set a new Highscore and challenge your friends!

Download this FREE arcade game now and save Christmas with pups!
